MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 11-NOV-2020 13:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the DG9 postcode area of Lochans, Stranraer. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.30am to repair an overhead line located on Main Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.51am on Wednesday 11th November 2020.
